SQLFunctionSpec.Name: Children Selected for Sponsorship Function to get list from XML
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns the list of children selected for a new Sponsorship, list is in XML
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION USR_UFN_CHILDREN_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_FROMITEMLISTXML ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @ITEMLISTXML xml ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT T.c.value('(ID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'ID', T.c.value('(NAME)[1]','nvarchar(50)') AS 'CHILDID' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/CHILDREN/ITEM') T(c) )
